about: "In 2008, I started getting involved with code, PHP & MySQL at a basic level. I quickly fell in love with the web, and also took up Graphics and SE0 to provide the full web solution. I shortly followed this with many intricate web pages and core programming projects. I was hooked. My initial experiences were completely business driven. I decided to take on all challenges that presented themselves. It was not long before I found myself employed full time, in 2012."

experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.description: "It was my responsibility to develop online infrastructure within CLC World. My projects have included Booking engines; data driven dashboards for Reporting, Social media and Email and involvement in the creative department’s Media Library. In 2018, I was privileged to be the creator of critical business solutions, like REST apis for lead actioning the company’s vital data services. At the same time, I continued to maintain the large fleet of company marketing sites."

experiences.title: Web Projects Junior
experiences.description: "My initial role was co-management of over 40 web pages, WordPress theming, updates and security. I also had considerable involvement in designing pages, banners and content publishing. Gradually, as my role progressed, I became worked more with mobile and UI design. Keeping up with the fast pace of changes that the role in a large company demanded, I was able to bring my programming experience to the table to resolve a large variety of lead/data capture solutions for the department. This lead to a promotion of responsibility and job role."

experiences.title: Designer / Developer
experiences.description: "During my time as a freelancer, I have had involvement in creating a large number of websites at a professional level.\n These have ranged from static 5 page sites, to Shopping carts and huge Real estate directory sites,\n where I provided solutions in the way of data integration websites and SQL databases with thousands of pages of fresh, indexable content."

experiences.title: Web Designer
experiences.description: "My job at Property Point Marbella was to develop the company webistes, along with enhancing the company’s presence and reputation on search engines and social media. During this time,\n I was managed by a large, local, third party tech team to realize the specific goals laid out by them.\n I gathered extensive useful experience and we launched ambitious SEO driven landing page campaigns comprising of over one hundred satellite sites."
